user_request: install app "Lyft - Rideshare, Bikes, Scooters & Transit"
screen_desc: The screenshot shows an Android home screen with a pink gradient wallpaper. It has app icons arranged in a grid, including Google Play, LinkedIn, DuckDuckGo, NewsBreak, Expedia, Speedtest, eBay, Truecaller, ColorNote, Adobe Acrobat, and Indeed Jobs. Below the grid, there are two primary app icons for messaging and Chrome browser. A Google search bar with a voice assistant shortcut is at the bottom. The status bar at the top displays the time (9:30), battery, and network icons.
